ygData.subject: Re: Bard sit in or Mana Song walkout or whatever (long, possibly rant ish)
ygData.msgSnippet: I m not in that shot. Pwyll and Monica were to bard friends of mine. I m offscreen by the bb exit. I had Pwyll s icq but as far as I know he quit and went back
ygData.messageBody:
I'm not in that shot. Pwyll and Monica were to bard friends of mine. I'm
offscreen by the bb exit. I had Pwyll's icq but as far as I know he
quit and went back to UO. You could ask the one on your server if it's
him back again. If so say Phayde says hi.

On Sat, Dec 04/99, "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...> wrote:
> From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
>
> which character are you? there is a bard named Pwyll on my server? common
> name?
>
>
> > They nerfed it well before release I'm afraid. To get an idea of how
> > well it worked in beta, check out this screenshot I saved from my BB
> > days in P4.
